text: Mariana Lengyel (née Ionescu; born 14 April 1953) is a Romanian female former track and field athlete who competed in the discus throw. She was a three-time national champion, winning from 1987 to 1989.Romanian Championships. GBR Athletics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She represented her country at the 1987 World Championships in Athletics, finishing in eighth place.Mariana Lengyel. IAAF. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She was bronze medallist on home turf in Bucharest at the 1981 Summer Universiade.World Student Games (Women). GBR Athletics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. Her personal best was achieved in 1986 and ranked her fifth globally that year.Mariana Lengyel. Track and Field Statistics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. As of 2018, she ranks in the all-time top 40 for the event.All Time Top Lists senior outdoor Discus Throw women. IAAF. title: Mariana Lengyel
